medical_history.history_of_present_illness: Symptoms began about a month ago, with pain described as worse in the right lower quadrant. Patient had a hard small bowel movement today. Symptoms are exacerbated by constipation issues.
medical_history.past_medical_history: Developmental delay, seizure disorder, asthma, ASD s/p repair, primary amenorrhea, osteoporosis, congenital heart disease (repaired), conductive hearing loss, optic atrophy/neuritis, anxiety.
medical_history.family_history: No reported heart disease, diabetes, or cancer in family members.
